name: Dark - BitBucket
description:
Darkens the BitBucket website for late night programming.

Inspired by: http://userstyles.org/styles/37035

user.name: DeathTBO
user.about:
((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

FreeStyler & FreeStyler team or other style-ripper bots are not allowed use my themes on any website.

Under "No Redistribution" license you need to ask me to use or modify my styles. If you want to install them from userstyles.org and only apply to stylish or stylus extensions feel free to do so without asking.

((((####----My Licence For All Themes---####))))

Thanks DestructiveBurn for the beautiful license terms.

additional_info:
License can be viewed here: https://userstyles.org/users/277242

Git repository: https://bitbucket.org/DeathTBO/tbos-stylish

Version 2.02

Fixed dialog box for making new repositories.

Version 2.01

Fixed code snippets in the bug tracker.

Version 2

Initial update for BitBucket redesign.

Version 1.53

Fixed some username text colors, and textbox colors.

Version 1.5

Fixed source highlighting.

Version 1.49

Fixed addition/deletion text color being too bright on a bright background.

Version 1.48

Fixed marketing and promotional material, brightened text, and some minor tweaks.

Version 1.47

Fixed commit author text color, and banner message background color.

Version 1.46

Fixed messages.

Version 1.45

Fixed code preview size and a vote counter.

Version 1.44

Fixed comment preview, and reply header bar.

Version 1.43

Minor fixes.

Version 1.42

Fixed reviewers and authors background color. Also thanks Nikita Litvin for helping with some issues.

Version 1.4

Fixed syntax highlighter for deleted keywords.

Version 1.3

Fixed warning banner.

Version 1.2

Fixed new group dialog box.

Version 1.1

Fixed buttons moving on hover.

Version 1.0

Fixed the source view's text color, and background. Fixed the color of dropdown icons.
